jd: Hi cloud 098, You have a new mention from the Recruiters Community workspace (https://talent-recruiters.slack.com/x-p7639880653120-7871217163315-7953981517494/team). --- #general View in the archives: https://talent-recruiters.slack.com/x-p7639880653120-7871217163315-7953981517494/archives/C07NFHXB7RN/p1730320427783329 shabeena bridgeflair (3:33 PM, October 30th) *Urgent Backfilling C2C Requirements* *12+ years Experience MUST* *Strictly NO GC OPT and CPT* *Only Strong And Genuine consultants who can ready to share i94details with updated resume* *We have interview slots available for Today* *Java Developer* Location - Plano Tx & Mclean VA Long term opportunity H1 Transfers are highly recommended We have interview slots available for Today *DevOps Engineer)* Location - Mclean VA AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, OnePipeline, achieve site reliability / Open Platform reliability, mix of both DevOps and SRE, Splunk and NewRelic *No WhatsApp email is the best way to reach me* :e-mail: Reach out at shabeena@bridgeflair.com :link: Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/shabeenashaik12786
